metadata.name: Miner's Lunch
metadata.description:
This artwork is the most known piece of my project: “Altitude -750 / Mineworkers “. 20 art-pieces of the project were exhibited in different countries and awarded. Together with the other selected ones, it took place in the catalogue of Ruhr Museum in Germany and presented at the opening exhibition of the museum. It was used as the cover photography of the opening invitation. 
The artwork is offered for sale in limited edition by The Route Photography Gallery in its main location in Amsterdam and at international art fairs.  
The buyer will receive 30x45 certificated version of the photography printed on Hahnemuhle Museum Etching Fine Art Paper as Archival Pigment print.
